name: Pixel BoomBot For The King
description:
Oh no! The king has been kidnapped! It's your job as a loyal knight to rescue him!

Enter in a Turn Based RPG with a group of knight's in a skill check clash for your king. Fight for your path from monsters you encounter along the way. Use the advantage's from the knight's color and level of their giving. And hey, maybe you can meet some friends along the way too, including a known armed force...

Key Features:
* Mouse Movement
* 200+ Battles
* A New Turn Based RPG Style
* Events & Games
* Easy Teleport Feature
